overview:
Jim is VP of the Buzzillions Platform where he manages the growth and expansion of Buzzillions.com, a customer reviews website. His passion is creating a user-centric site where the actual words from real consumers lead shoppers to the best buying decision.

Born into the Internet in 1996, Jim has spent the last 11 years architecting, creating and managing large scale eCommerce services for hundreds of online retailers. He was part of the team that created the review service for Fogdog.com and knew then that reviews would revolutionize the buying experience.

Prior to PowerReviews, Jim served as an e-commerce architect and consultant to a variety of innovative eCommerce companies including GSI Commerce and NapaStyle. Jim is a graduate of Stanford University.
